00027 void Add3X3Pit( INT32 iMapIndex )
00028 {
00029       EXITGRID ExitGrid;
00030       if( !gfEditMode )
00031             ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( TRUE );
00032       AddObjectToTail( iMapIndex + 159, REGWATERTEXTURE1 );
00033       AddObjectToTail( iMapIndex -   1,   REGWATERTEXTURE2 );
00034       AddObjectToTail( iMapIndex - 161, REGWATERTEXTURE3 );
00035       AddObjectToTail( iMapIndex + 160, REGWATERTEXTURE4 );
00036       AddObjectToTail( iMapIndex,                     REGWATERTEXTURE5 );
00037       AddObjectToTail( iMapIndex - 160, REGWATERTEXTURE6 );
00038       AddObjectToTail( iMapIndex + 161, REGWATERTEXTURE7 );
00039       AddObjectToTail( iMapIndex +   1, REGWATERTEXTURE8 );
00040       AddObjectToTail( iMapIndex - 159, REGWATERTEXTURE9 );
00041       if( !gfEditMode )
00042       { //Add the exitgrids associated with the pit.
00043             ExitGrid.ubGotoSectorX = (UINT8)gWorldSectorX;
00044             ExitGrid.ubGotoSectorY = (UINT8)gWorldSectorY;
00045             ExitGrid.ubGotoSectorZ = (UINT8)(gbWorldSectorZ+1);
00046             ExitGrid.usGridNo = (UINT16)iMapIndex;
00047             AddExitGridToWorld( iMapIndex + 159, &ExitGrid );
00048             AddExitGridToWorld( iMapIndex -   1, &ExitGrid );
00049             AddExitGridToWorld( iMapIndex - 161, &ExitGrid );
00050             AddExitGridToWorld( iMapIndex + 160, &ExitGrid );
00051             AddExitGridToWorld( iMapIndex,                   &ExitGrid );
00052             AddExitGridToWorld( iMapIndex - 160, &ExitGrid );
00053             AddExitGridToWorld( iMapIndex + 161, &ExitGrid );
00054             AddExitGridToWorld( iMapIndex +   1, &ExitGrid );
00055             AddExitGridToWorld( iMapIndex - 159, &ExitGrid );
00056             RecompileLocalMovementCostsFromRadius( (INT16)iMapIndex, 2 );
00057       }
00058 
00059       MarkWorldDirty();
00060       if( !gfEditMode )
00061             ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( FALSE );
00062 }

00132 void Remove3X3Pit( INT32 iMapIndex )
00133 {
00134       RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex + 159, REGWATERTEXTURE, REGWATERTEXTURE );
00135       RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex -   1,   REGWATERTEXTURE, REGWATERTEXTURE );
00136       RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex - 161, REGWATERTEXTURE, REGWATERTEXTURE );
00137       RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex + 160, REGWATERTEXTURE, REGWATERTEXTURE );
00138       RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex,                     REGWATERTEXTURE, REGWATERTEXTURE );
00139       RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex - 160, REGWATERTEXTURE, REGWATERTEXTURE );
00140       RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex + 161, REGWATERTEXTURE, REGWATERTEXTURE );
00141       RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex +   1, REGWATERTEXTURE, REGWATERTEXTURE );
00142       RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex - 159, REGWATERTEXTURE, REGWATERTEXTURE );
00143       MarkWorldDirty();
00144 }

00175 
00176 void AddAllPits()
00177 {
00178       UINT32 i;
00179       for( i = 0; i < guiNumWorldItems; i++ )
00180       {
00181             if( gWorldItems[ i ].o.usItem == ACTION_ITEM )
00182             {
00183                   if( gWorldItems[ i ].o.bActionValue == ACTION_ITEM_SMALL_PIT )
00184                         Add3X3Pit( gWorldItems[ i ].sGridNo );          
00185                   else if( gWorldItems[ i ].o.bActionValue == ACTION_ITEM_LARGE_PIT )
00186                         Add5X5Pit( gWorldItems[ i ].sGridNo );
00187             }     
00188       }
00189 }
00190 
00191 void RemoveAllPits()
00192 {
00193       UINT32 i;
00194       for( i = 0; i < guiNumWorldItems; i++ )
00195       {
00196             if( gWorldItems[ i ].o.usItem == ACTION_ITEM )
00197             {
00198                   if( gWorldItems[ i ].o.bActionValue == ACTION_ITEM_SMALL_PIT )
00199                         Remove3X3Pit( gWorldItems[ i ].sGridNo );       
00200                   else if( gWorldItems[ i ].o.bActionValue == ACTION_ITEM_LARGE_PIT )
00201                         Remove5X5Pit( gWorldItems[ i ].sGridNo );
00202             }     
00203       }
00204 }
00205 
00206 void SearchForOtherMembersWithinPitRadiusAndMakeThemFall( INT16 sGridNo, INT16 sRadius )
00207 {
00208       INT16 x, y, sNewGridNo;
00209       UINT8 ubID;
00210       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00211 
00212 
00213       PlayJA2Sample( CAVE_COLLAPSE, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( sGridNo ) );
00214       for( y = -sRadius; y <= sRadius; y++ ) for( x = -sRadius; x <= sRadius; x++ )
00215       {
00216             sNewGridNo = sGridNo + y * WORLD_COLS + x;
00217             //Validate gridno location, and check if there are any mercs here.  If there are
00218             //any mercs, we want them to fall below.  The exitgrid already exists at this location
00219             if( GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( sNewGridNo ) )
00220             {
00221 
00222                   // Check if buddy exists here.....
00223                   ubID = WhoIsThere2( sNewGridNo, 0 );
00224 
00225                   if ( ubID != NOBODY )
00226                   {
00227                         // OK, make guy fall...
00228                         // Set data to look for exit grid....
00229                         pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubID ];
00230 
00231                         pSoldier->uiPendingActionData4 = sNewGridNo;
00232 
00233                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, FALL_INTO_PIT, 0 , FALSE );
00234                   }                 
00235             }
00236       }
00237 }
00238 
00239 void HandleFallIntoPitFromAnimation( UINT8 ubID )
00240 {
00241       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubID ];
00242       EXITGRID ExitGrid;
00243       INT16 sPitGridNo;
00244       // OK, get exit grid...
00245       
00246       sPitGridNo = (INT16)pSoldier->uiPendingActionData4;
00247 
00248       GetExitGrid( sPitGridNo, &ExitGrid );
00249 
00250       // Given exit grid, make buddy move to next sector....
00251       pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
00252       pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = ExitGrid.usGridNo;
00253 
00254       pSoldier->sSectorX = ExitGrid.ubGotoSectorX;
00255       pSoldier->sSectorY = ExitGrid.ubGotoSectorY;
00256       pSoldier->bSectorZ = ExitGrid.ubGotoSectorZ;
00257 
00258       // Remove from world......
00259       RemoveSoldierFromTacticalSector( pSoldier, TRUE );
00260 
00261       HandleSoldierLeavingSectorByThemSelf( pSoldier );
00262 
00263       SetSoldierHeight( pSoldier, 0 );
00264 
00265 }
